Though some people say summits do not achieve anything
column4: one of the outcomes of the housing summit is that we are going to agree an internal specification for social housing. A standard internal specification will shorten timelines. I will not agree a standard external specification
column5: but why not agree an internal specification? Perhaps Deputy Ó Broin has visited some of the new social housing builds recently. They are fantastic.  The Deputy mentioned a proposed two-stage approval process. We can do more with a one-stage process. I will not say any more than that.

column1: #EoghanMurphy	unknown-#EoghanMurphy-party	unknown-#EoghanMurphy-dob	unknown-#EoghanMurphy-constituency	speech	unkown-language	2018-09-27 00:00:00	Rebuilding Ireland - Action Plan for Housing and Homelessness: Discussion (Resumed)	162	In terms of what I have seen - and I am trying to remember from the top of my head - I believe we have identified enough land for social housing for local authorities to take us to at least 2023 under the national development plan ambition that I put into that plan. column3: which are so important in terms of social housing delivery
column4: are met by ensuring everything is done in tandem with that.

column1: #EoghanMurphy	unknown-#EoghanMurphy-party	unknown-#EoghanMurphy-dob	unknown-#EoghanMurphy-constituency	speech	unkown-language	2018-09-27 00:00:00	Rebuilding Ireland - Action Plan for Housing and Homelessness: Discussion (Resumed)	165	There will not be a supplementary budget
column2: because we can move money around
column3: as necessary

column2: 000 tenancies have been created under the scheme
